original_title: The North Face Expedition: Everest - The North Face, Vol. 1
overview: Returning to Everest for his thirteenth expedition, world renowned mountaineer Pete Athans attempts to be the first Westerner ever to summit Everest for a sixth time. In collaboration with National Geographic, Pete will measure the exact height of the rooftop of the world.
title: The North Face Expedition: Everest - The North Face, Vol. 1
